review: The Amazon Fire stick just puts everything you can PURCHASE in one place. Expected a little more free watchings. The Amazon fire stick promotes how you have some things to watch for free and that prime users have a bunch of free stuff. Not really true, I'm a prime memeber and hardely have much free watchings at all. Don't expect to get more than a few hours of entertainment, before you have start buying episodes. Not what I was expecting; but then again I should have known better. I mainly use it now for the apps, like Netflix and such.
author: Luke
